description: There is uncertainty whether Microsoft Defender has been eliminated from the Windows base image or if this issue pertains specifically to the Home to Pro upgrade. System administrators deploying Enterprise or Education SKUs may need to clarify this point to ensure adequate threat protection. This confusion could impede proper deployment and security practices within the organization. The unidentified KB Article (KB07059) may contain relevant information that could assist in resolving this query. The situation highlights the necessity of clear communication regarding the inclusion of security features among various Windows SKU offerings.
